Package pt.uc.dei.config

package pt.uc.dei.config

    Description
    ApplicationConfig
    Configuration class for the JAX-RS application.
    CorsFilter
    Implements a Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) filter for HTTP responses.
    EmailConfig
    Configuration class for SMTP email settings.
    IPLogger
    A wrapper around Log4j2 Logger that auto-injects client IP from MDC.
    LoggingFilter
    Implements a request filter for logging incoming HTTP requests.
